alert.note: Alert for Butte; Glenn (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 4:42PM PST until March 06 at 5:30PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Butte County in northern California... Northeastern Glenn County in central California... * Until 530 PM PST. * At 442 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ordbend, or 10 miles east of Orland, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Chico, Nord and Hamilton City. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
